description:
QUICKEZE MULTIPACK (5X12 LOZ)

QUICK-EZE Original antacid tablets help provide rapid relief from heartburn and acid indigestion by neutralising stomach acid fast. Proudly made in Australia, QUICK-EZE Original antacid tablets contain active ingredients Calcium Carbonate, Magnesium Trisilicate and Magnesium Carbonate Hydrate, and no artificial colours. Each pack contains 60 tablets, conveniently packed in 5 sticks of 12, perfect to take on-the-go. Heartburn and Indigestion can be triggered by a number of factors such as lifestyle, diet and pregnancy. You can help prevent Heartburn & Indigestion by avoiding spicy, fatty or greasy foods; eating in moderation; lowering your stress levels; and not eating late at night.

Magnesium Carbonate Hydrate ; No artificial colours ; Made in Australia ; 60 individually wrapped tablets, packed in 5 sticks of 12 ; Heartburn and Indigestion can be triggered by a number of factors such as lifestyle, diet and pregnancy.

name: Quick-eze Heartburn & Indigestion Relief Original 60 Pack
